“Crucial Iran nuclear talks begin in the sultanate…”
Not today’s headline — this was Nov 2014, when Oman hosted the Iran-US nuclear talks that led to the JCPOA in 2015. I was on the ground in Muscat, covering those negotiations for 
@muscat_daily
.
Fast forward to Feb 6, 2026 —
Fast forward to today— Oman is once again hosting Iran-US talks. Diplomacy, like journalism, has a long memory.
Sharing a few clips from my 2014 coverage for those interested in how history often echoes — sometimes louder than we expect
